chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (shift k s) b (raw_insert (if le_gt_dec k s then k else k - 1) a e)

Premises:
le_gt_dec : forall n m : nat, {n <= m} + {n > m}
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation shift := (lift 1)
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
LiftVar_idx = {| lift_var := fun w k x : nat => if le_gt_dec k x as s return ((if s then w + x else x) = (if s then w + x else x)) then eq_refl else eq_refl |} : LiftVar
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
raw_insert_zero : forall (A : Type) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert 0 o e = o :: e
Reflect.Nat_ltb_lt : forall a b : nat, is_true (a <? b) < -> a < b
LiftZero_idx = {| lift_zero := fun k t : nat => if le_gt_dec k t as s return ((if s then 0 + t else t) = t) then eq_refl else eq_refl |} : LiftZero
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
LiftLift_idx = {| lift_lift := fun (t k s wk ws : nat) (H : k <= s) => match le_gt_dec k (if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) as s0 return ((if s0 then wk + (if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) else if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) = (if le_gt_dec (wk + s) (if le_gt_dec k t then wk + t else t) then ws + (if le_gt_dec k t then wk + t else t) else if le_gt_dec k t then wk + t else t)) with | left x => match le_gt_dec s t as s0 return (k <= (if s0 then ws + t else t) -> wk + (if s0 then ws + t else t) = (if le_gt_dec (wk + s) (if le_gt_dec k t then wk + t else t) then ws + (if...
Reflect.Nat_gt_ltb : forall a b : nat, a > b < -> is_true (b <? a)
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
subst_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s : nat) (w : ?V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?H0 : [ |- Subst ?V ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?SubstSubst : [ |- SubstSubst]
LiftLiftFuse_idx = {| lift_lift_fuse := fun (t k s wk ws : nat) (H : s <= k <= s + ws) => match le_gt_dec k (if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) as s0 return ((if s0 then wk + (if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) else if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) = (if le_gt_dec s t then wk + ws + t else t)) with | left x => match le_gt_dec s t as s0 return (k <= (if s0 then ws + t else t) -> wk + (if s0 then ws + t else t) = (if s0 then wk + ws + t else t)) with | left _ => fun _ : k <= ws + t => (fun lemma : (fun t0 : BinNums.Z => wk + (ws + t) = wk + ws + t <-> t0 = BinInt.Z...
Build_LiftLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)) -> LiftLift
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
lift_lift_reversed : LiftLift -> forall wk k ws s t : nat, k >= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws s (lift wk (k - ws) t)
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
Record LiftLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftLift { lift_lift : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) } Arguments LiftLift {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftLift [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
lift_lift : forall t k s wk ws : nat, k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record LiftSubst1 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst1 { lift_subst_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) } Arguments LiftSubst1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
lift_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst : [ |- LiftSubst]
Build_LiftLiftFuse : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), s <= k <= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift (wk + ws) s t) -> LiftLiftFuse
lift_subst_1 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst1 : [ |- LiftSubst1]
